Johann Sebastian Bach

Chromatic Fantasia and Fugue in D minor, BWV 903

c. 1717–1723

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 11' 30"

  • 1. Fantasia
  • 1. Fantasia (earliest version)
  • 2. Fugue

The fantasia exists in three different versions: an early version (BWV1,2,2a 903a; BWV3 903.1), an intermediate version according to a copy by Johann Tobias Krebs (BWV3 903.2), and the best-known, final version (BWV1,2,2a 903; BWV3 903.3).

Recommended editions

  • Neue Bach-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · V, 9/2 · BA 5092-01 · Sechs kleine Praeludien / Einzeln überlieferte Klavierwerke I · ed. Uwe Wolf [including both earlier versions of the fantasia]
  • Bärenreiter · BA 5232 · Einzeln überlieferte Klavierwerke I · ed. Uwe Wolf [including both earlier versions of the fantasia]
  • Henle · HN 219 · Fantasien, Präludien und Fugen · ed. Georg van Dadelsen / Klaus Rönnau [including the earliest version of the fantasia]
  • Henle · HN 220 · Fantasien, Präludien und Fugen · ed. Georg van Dadelsen / Klaus Rönnau [including the earliest version of the fantasia]
  • Henle · HN 1219 · Fantasien, Präludien und Fugen · ed. Georg van Dadelsen / Klaus Rönnau [including the earliest version of the fantasia]
  • Henle · HN 163 · ed. Georg van Dadelsen / Klaus Rönnau [including the earliest version of the fantasia]
  • Henle · HN 1163 · ed. Georg van Dadelsen / Klaus Rönnau [including the earliest version of the fantasia]
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50161 · ed. Ulrich Leisinger [including both earlier versions of the fantasia]
